abstract: JPMorgan Chase unveiled plans Monday to cut a total of 9,200 jobs at Washington Mutual, which it acquired in September after the Seattle savings and loan became the nation’s largest bank to fail amid the ongoing financial crisis.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase unveiled plans Monday to cut a total of 9,200 jobs at Washington Mutual, which it acquired in September after the Seattle savings and loan became the nation’s largest bank to fail amid the ongoing financial crisis.

headline.main: JPMorgan to Lay Off 9,200 at Washington Mutual
